title: Interpretation of a dream about war and missiles for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about war and missiles in a dream for single and married women. Dreams are part of a person’s subconscious and are a natural phenomenon that can happen to any person as a result of the events that he experiences during the day that he must reorganize and arrange, whether these events are just thoughts, feelings, or imaginary images. He thinks so. A period of deep sleep, so in this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of a dream about war and missiles in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of a dream about war and missiles in a dream There are many interpretations related to seeing projectiles in a dream. If a person sees missiles in the sky in his dream, this is a positive dream that indicates that he will be able to achieve his goals, ambitions, and things that he believes are difficult to achieve in real life. Either the missiles were on the ground or they descended towards the dreamer. It indicates the dreamer's need for different things to happen that changes his life and that he is trying to stay away from evil. In addition, a dream about war generally indicates the dreamer’s love for himself and his desire for change. Interpretation of a dream about war and missiles for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees missiles and war in her dream, this means that there is someone proposing to her or that there is a reason for joy and celebration in her home, and if she sees An unmarried woman dreams that she is participating in it. War, this is evidence of the reasons for happy things happening to her that she has been waiting for a long time, and if she sees missiles falling at a distance from her, this proves that she is happy with the events that will happen in her. The near future and that she will be free of problems and problems soon. Interpretation of a dream about war and missiles for a married woman. If a married woman sees war in her dream and her husband is the regular party to the war, this means that in reality she is facing many problems with her husband, and if she sees war and missiles falling on her house, this indicates On the presence of problems and quarrels between her and the neighbors surrounding her, she often thinks about these problems, and if she sees herself in a state of war, and that she places a weapon on her partner’s stomach, this is evidence that she will soon give birth to a little girl. Interpretation of a dream about war and missiles for a pregnant woman: Seeing war in a dream for a pregnant woman means that she will give birth to a healthy child, God willing, and that she will soon get rid of the problems and difficulties of pregnancy. Pain and that childbirth will be easy for her. Dreams are among the things that it is normal for every person to see during sleep, but they differ from one person to another, and there are many interpreters who provide interpretations of dreams, and this does not confirm what the interpreters say because the words are just protection and there is nothing to confirm Her health.

title: Interpretation of seeing a football player in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of seeing a football player in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Football is one of the team games with an audience of millions of people around the world. It is the first popular game in the world, but seeing a football player in a dream has many connotations and interpretations that vary, of course, depending on the situation and social status of the viewer. What does it mean to see a famous football player? This is an indicator of the success of this business and the achievement of many profits. The meaning of hitting the ball with the head in a dream for a single woman? An unpleasant vision because it indicates the presence of problems and obstacles. What does it mean to play football and score goals in a dream? It indicates that the public will hear good news soon. Interpretation of seeing a green ball in a dream? It indicates the disappearance of worries and the penetration of anxiety. Interpretation of seeing a football player in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a famous football player in a dream symbolizes success, overcoming difficulties and achieving goals. As these appear The vision that it is time to start a new project that the viewer may be thinking about, but he is worried about the results, because this vision portends the success of the project, God willing. And if the person with the vision intends to start a new business with other people. He saw her in his dream playing football with famous players, and this is an indication of The success of this business and the achievement of many profits. Seeing a famous football player in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates success in her field of work or study and portends her engagement to a prosperous and moral young man. See also: – Interpretation of seeing a famous football player in a dream Interpretation of seeing a ball in a dream for a woman SingleIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is playing ball, this is a sign that she is wasting your time on unnecessary matters. And if a girl sees in her dream that she cannot catch the ball or play, this vision indicates that she is connected to an emotional relationship that is doomed to failure. If a girl with a vision gets engaged This vision is a sign that her engagement will be canceled soon. Seeing a ball hitting the head in a dream for an unmarried woman is an unpleasant vision. It shows that there are problems and obstacles that the girl faces in her life that cause her worry and anxiety. Perhaps this vision is a sign of worship, prayer, and getting close to Almighty God. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a football player: Seeing a wedding with a famous football player in a dream indicates an imminent marriage for a woman from a vision with a good husband waiting for her. This vision also portends relief from anxiety and difficult problems that the owner of the vision is going through during this time.. Symbolizes the vision: I Marrying a famous football player means many positive changes will occur in the dreamer’s life. It also indicates happiness and stability in life. Interpretation of playing football in a dream for a married woman: If a woman sees in a dream that she is playing football or watching a football match, this vision warns her of problems between her and her husband. These problems may be due to the fact that this woman wants to achieve her goals in life. Likewise, without taking into account the interest of her husband and her home, she must reconsider her lifestyle and dealing with her husband.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a river in a dream in detail?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with a complete interpretation of seeing a river in a dream. The river is the main source of fertile water. The river is blood. Seeing a full river in a dream is a vision that shows many interpretations. Therefore, we have collected for you, dear followers, everything related to the complete interpretation of the Nile in a dream, as well as the complete interpretation of the river drying up in a dream, as well as swimming in the river in a dream, just as we have presented for you everything related to the symbol of the river in a complete dream, from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. Why does a son dream? Drowning in a river? Interpretation of seeing a large, full river in a dream is a sign of strength and power and indicates a wise and just person. Drowning in a river in a dream is full of unpleasant visions that indicate problems, sadness, and worries. Seeing a clean river in a dream full of it means that the dreamer will get rid of all The worries and consequences that surround him in his life. Also, seeing a dove in the river in a complete dream indicates the dreamer’s salvation from all sins and good circumstances. The river in the dream of Imam Al-SadiqSeeing a river of fire in a dream is full of unwanted dreams that indicate the dreamer’s corruption of his faith and religion, As well as evidence of the sins and great sins that he commits. Why is the Nile River dreaming? Why is the Nile River dreaming in a complete dream - evidence for the dreamer about kindness, food, and receiving benefits and benefits. Drinking Nile water in a dream for non-Egyptians is considered a sign of the dreamer’s upcoming visit to the Arab Republic of Egypt. Swimming in The Nile River in a complete dream indicates that the dreamer will be saved from some evil and haters in his life. Complete swimming in the river in the dream. The dream of bathing in the river is a praiseworthy dream that shows the dreamer psychological peace and financial stability that will return. The dream of bathing in the river is considered a harbinger of the fact that the dreamer will satisfy some desires that God made it in his life. Why dream of a dry river? Drying a river in a dream is a sign of poverty, helplessness and the fact that the dreamer is entering a period filled with severe suffering. Seeing a dry river in a dream shows the dreamer’s inability to take responsibility for his life and the emergence of some problems and obstacles that will block his path. Why dream of a flowing river? Seeing a fully flowing river in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will easily overcome all difficulties and problems in his life. Drinking in a dream a fully flowing river is a sign that the dreamer will receive blessings and achieve many benefits. Seeing a river in a dream Full of common women. The interpretation of seeing the entire Nile in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of her marriage to a man with a strong body and character, evidence of a just and protective man. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will respond to you.

title: Interpretation of seeing lentil soup in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing lentil soup in a dream via the Vision website roy2a.com. Seeing lentil soup in a dream has many meanings. Seeing lentil soup in a dream can be a sign of good or a harbinger of evil. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing lentil soup in a dream according to the condition and circumstances of the viewer, and whether the man or woman is single, married, or pregnant, and today through the Vision website we discuss the interpretation in detail of seeing lentil soup in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin. Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing lentil soup in a dream? Seeing lentil soup in a dream indicates that the dreamer lives a life full of bliss, stability, and happiness. Seeing in a dream eating lentil soup indicates that the dreamer is always satisfied with his lot and with what God wrote it for him. Seeing buying lentils in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with many good things and money in his life. Seeing sick lentils in a dream indicates his recovery from this disease, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing chicken in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing lentil soup in Nabulsi’s dream? Seeing in a dream eating lentil soup indicates that the monarch will receive good news about his work in the coming days. Seeing a sick person eating lentil soup in a dream It seems that he will recover from this disease soon, and God knows best. Seeing cleaning lenses in a dream indicates the end of all bad things in his life in the period Next.Seeing in a dream eating raw lentils says that he will go through a difficult period full of problems and disagreements. See also: Interpretation of seeing cooking rice in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing lentil soup in a dream for a single woman? Seeing women alone eating lentil soup in a dream indicates that she has a successful career and that she will become Seeing a student eating lentil soup in a dream indicates her success and achievement in her academic life. Seeing a woman alone buying lentils in a dream indicates the soonest date of her marriage to a rich man and she will live with him happily and stably. Seeing women alone eating raw lentils in a dream shows that she will face many worries and sorrows. In the coming period. See also: Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing lentil soup in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman eating lentil soup in a dream indicates her married life full of stability and happiness. Seeing a married woman cooking lentils in a dream says that she is a good woman and sacrifices herself, and she She does everything for her husband and her family. Seeing delicious lentils in a dream announces good and abundant livelihood for her and her family. Seeing a married woman buying lentils in a dream indicates that God will carry her soon, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing cooking rice in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing lentil soup in a dream? For a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman preparing lentil soup in a dream indicates that she will go through an easy and effortless birth process without any fatigue or pain. title: Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating sweetsInterpretation of seeing eating sweets in a dream Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Eating sweets in a dream. You can see:Interpretation of seeing eating sweetsInterpretation of seeing sweets in a dream Ibn Sirin mentioned a sweet piece of sugar as words or a kiss. Jaafar Al-Sadiq said: “Sugar is interpreted in five ways: good words And a kiss, and benefit, and money, and children, as long as he sees sugar.” Jabir al-Maghribi said: Whoever sees a lot of sugar, its fragrance is good, and selling sugar is good. It was said: Whoever sees that he is eating sugar, it is glory and a blessing; Because it is the food of people of grace, and sugar is good in any case, whether one sees it or eats it. And seeing it is for the child’s upbringing and stability for the courts, and it is very good. It was said: The dream of sugar is the acquisition of gold, and white is the acquisition of dirhams, and sugar is less than that, and the more it is repeated, the better its quality. Whoever eats or He sees candy in his dream, his financial conditions will improve and his emotional problems will be overcome. Just as sweets in the climate indicate faith in religion, marriage for unmarried people, healing of the sick, guidance, repentance, knowledge, and the removal of worries. Candy for the one who eats it indicates what is permissible and good words for the one who eats it. For believers, it is the sweetness of faith. Whoever eats sweets in a dream, whatever its type, and feels that it is delicious and good, this has shown him that the money will return to you, and the hope of its return has ended. Sweets in a dream is a good vision, not bad. Eating sweets in a dream also indicates happiness and a lot. From nutrition in your home. Whoever sees a lot of sugar indicates money and grace. As for whoever sees that he found sugar and bought it, it is not good. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: Seeing sweets in a dream is a praiseworthy vision, because it indicates good luck and abundance. Money. If one sees in a dream that he is eating the sweets he loves, this indicates that he will find the lost money. Sweets in a dream. If one sees in his dream that he is eating dates with sugar, this indicates great extravagance in wealth and an increase in blessings and many good deeds. If one sees in His dream is that he is eating a lot of sweets in a voracious manner, this means that this person will suffer from many health problems. Seeing sweets in a dream If the young man is single and sees that he is eating sweets, this indicates that he will achieve great wealth and great profit in the near future. If he is going to get married, this The vision indicates that the wedding is near and many good things will come. Interpretation of the vision of eating sweets in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen says: Seeing that eating sweets in a dream is one of the visions that brings good skin to the dreamer. If you dream that you are eating sweets, this means that you will enjoy your favorite character. Everyone has it. It indicates that you will have a lot of dreams and ambitions that you aim for in your general life. Seeing pleasure and joy in eating sweets is getting rid of worries and problems. It shows that you will lose money or you will achieve a dream after a period of hard work and effort. Eating sweets greedily A great presence is opening many closed roads and earning a lot of livelihood through education

You can see:Interpretation of seeing eating sweetsInterpretation of seeing sweets in a dream Ibn Sirin mentioned a sweet piece of sugar as words or a kiss. Jaafar Al-Sadiq said: “Sugar is interpreted in five ways: good words And a kiss, and benefit, and money, and children, as long as he sees sugar.” Jabir al-Maghribi said: Whoever sees a lot of sugar, its fragrance is good, and selling sugar is good. It was said: Whoever sees that he is eating sugar, it is glory and a blessing; Because it is the food of people of grace, and sugar is good in any case, whether one sees it or eats it. And seeing it is for the child’s upbringing and stability for the courts, and it is very good. It was said: The dream of sugar is the acquisition of gold, and white is the acquisition of dirhams, and sugar is less than that, and the more it is repeated, the better its quality. Whoever eats or He sees candy in his dream, his financial conditions will improve and his emotional problems will be overcome. Just as sweets in the climate indicate faith in religion, marriage for unmarried people, healing of the sick, guidance, repentance, knowledge, and the removal of worries. Candy for the one who eats it indicates what is permissible and good words for the one who eats it. For believers, it is the sweetness of faith. Whoever eats sweets in a dream, whatever its type, and feels that it is delicious and good, this has shown him that the money will return to you, and the hope of its return has ended. Sweets in a dream is a good vision, not bad. Eating sweets in a dream also indicates happiness and a lot. From nutrition in your home. Whoever sees a lot of sugar indicates money and grace. As for whoever sees that he found sugar and bought it, it is not good. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: Seeing sweets in a dream is a praiseworthy vision, because it indicates good luck and abundance. Money. If one sees in a dream that he is eating the sweets he loves, this indicates that he will find the lost money. Sweets in a dream. If one sees in his dream that he is eating dates with sugar, this indicates great extravagance in wealth and an increase in blessings and many good deeds. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a castle in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a castle in a dream. The castle is used for fortification and protection from the enemy. This means superiority over competitors and happiness. It means sorrow for one who commits sins and is a sign of traveling to earn a living. A castle means a person of good reputation, happiness, stability, family and family ties. A castle in a dream testifies to protection and salvation from the demons of humanity and the jinn, as well as the strength of faith. Interpretation of seeing a castle: I dream of seeing a castle in a dream. A dream about a castle or castle means a wonderful position that you will gain in the future. Power means the position that you gain, and it is said that it is a job that he did not perform. One before. If you enter the castle in a dream to protect yourself from the enemy, this means victory and safety. The castle means abandoning sins and repentance. You dream of seeing the castle in a dream The castle in a dream and you open it, this means that you will get married at a very young age. If the castle is closed and there is A major obstacle to opening it and it did not open in front of you, so these problems prevent success. A dream castle is good news coming. Individual dream castle: Interpretation of a castle in a dream for an unmarried woman found inside the castle, and this means her marriage to a noble young man. Interpretation of seeing a castle means transforming a state of sadness and depression And misery turns into joy and happiness. You dream of seeing a castle in a dream. The castle refers to the king, which indicates that he attains a prominent position, prestige, and power. A castle in a dream provides a means of survival or a high degree or rank that indicates religious knowledge. Seeing a castle far from it is a sign of A business trip. Interpretation of a castle in a dream: Dreaming of seeing a palace in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a palace for a single man means marriage and it is said to be a good job if the young man is unemployed and looking for work and the castle is to facilitate matters. Destroying and destroying the castle means that the young man is reckless and far from religion. , or it means hypocrisy and fraud at work, and the bosses will soon find out and he will likely be removed from his own business. Dream of a palace for a married womanThe castle is a symbol of a beautiful, pious, strong, and refined woman, says a woman with children. If the castle is high, it means that the good news was not You expect it and it will happen. Dream of seeing a castle in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a castle protected by soldiers and soldiers means good management of your future affairs and stability of your life. If a woman discovers that the castle is her home, she will get closer to the head of state and enjoy great joy in the future. Dream of a castle in a dream. Seeing a castle indicates progress And the development and high status of the pioneer. The vision also indicates good luck. It also indicates the abandonment of disobedience and sins and the integrity of God’s commandments. If the bachelor sees the castle, this indicates nobility and sublimity. Dreaming of seeing the castle in a dream and the famous place you will reach. Seeing the opening of the castle in a dream For an unmarried young man, it indicates his marriage. Seeing a girl entering the castle indicates good luck, as well as the approaching engagement of her. Seeing the construction of a castle is evidence of preserving and preventing Satan’s whispers and getting rid of enemies. Interpretation of a castle in a dream Ibn Sirin says that a castle in a dream indicates the exit

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a strangulation grip in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of seeing noose in a dream, which indicates real problems and suffering, and can indicate love and friendship, due to the nature of the relationship in reality. If it is based on understanding and love, then the narrative bears witness to goodness, justice and love. Interpretations of marital disputes, suffocation, beatings, suffocation, crying, seeing beatings and fights in a dream, or using sharp tools indicate that life is unstable. We will explain in detail in this article. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi’s vision of the strait: Her mother-in-law’s nails proved that she and her husband tried to preserve her home. Dreaming of seeing a strait in a dream Strangling a mother or father in a dream indicates that the Messenger’s environment has disgraced him. The interpretation of these dreams with those you love in your dreams It is evidence of the fulfillment of visions of their aspirations and goals. Nails in a dream for two brothers symbolize news and strife when they hear it. The woman’s curls and slapping on her forehead showed how much her husband loves her. Interpretation of a dream about a strangulation fist by Ibn Sirin: The dream of seeing strangulation in a dream, strangling and fighting in a dream with children , indicates tension and disagreement between the family and the Prophet. Interpretation of a dream of being strangled in a dream with relatives is evidence of getting rid of problems and fears. Arguing with his father in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to take care of him. Dreaming of being strangled and beaten in the face in a dream is signs of a better life in the future. The dreamer's life. Interpretation of a dream about strangling a single woman: Dreaming of seeing diphtheria in a dream. Explain that seeing diphtheria in a dream about a girl and someone indicates that there is a quarrel in the area where you live. Seeing beatings and fights in a dream or using sharp tools means that life is unstable. Seeing An unmarried girl being beaten is evidence of her approaching marriage. Interpretation of a dream of strangulation for a married woman: A dream of seeing diphtheria in a dream. The interpretation of diphtheria in the dreams of a married and dead woman is her interpretation, meaning that she will live a good and rich life in her life. The dream’s interpretation of the problem between spouses is evidence of a crisis in Her life and incompatibility. Seeing a gallows with parents, father and mother indicates the dissolution of the relationship. Also suffocating in the dreams of a married woman means that there is already a quarrel and problems with the husband or in-laws. Interpretation of a dream seeing a man strangled: Struggling with colleagues shows rivalry. The dream of suffocation between parties in litigation It indicates that an agreement must be reached as quickly as possible. Seeing him strangling his family and brothers in a fight in a man’s dream means losing his money. A dream in which you see strangling in a dream indicates that there is a quarrel with a loyal and sincere friend, and indicates love and friendship between them and good relations between them. Choking with his wife in a man’s dream indicates an unstable marriage. Interpretation of a dream in which you see diphtheria with relatives: Arguments and fights with deceased parents show that he is on a path that does not satisfy them. Seeing disputes with family and relatives indicates failure in professional life and failure to achieve what is desired. Witnessing parents being strangled and flogged is evidence that they need attention and care. Interpretation of a dream of strangulation for a pregnant woman: Dreaming of seeing strangulation in a dream if

title: Interpretation of seeing an eagle in a dream by Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an eagle in a dream. Commentators explained: Seeing an eagle in a dream indicates a king and a ruler, and it may indicate a large amount of spoils. Whoever sees eagle meat in a dream, this is an alternative to obtaining more money or occupying a new position. Whoever sees it in a dream, an eagle disobeys him and disobeys him, and this indicates usurpation of the ruler or He has a great position. And whoever is able to catch an eagle in a dream and obey it, this indicates the acquisition of a great position and approach to those in authority and high positions. The interpretation is seeing the wings of an eagle in a dream, or whoever dreams that he has the bones of an eagle, this indicates a lot of money that he will get from the ruler or king. And whoever sees In a dream, an eagle tries to fly but falls on its back. This indicates entering distress and misery. Whoever sees in this dream an eagle attacking him and injuring him or scratching him, this indicates a long period of illness. If he is sick, and if he is not, then this indicates illness. Different interpretations of seeing an eagle. In a dream, whoever sees this in a dream changing his appearance into the shape of an eagle, this indicates longevity. And whoever sees in a dream eagle eggs hatching, this indicates that God Almighty will grant him a male child. And if someone gives something to an eagle chick on the day and everyone is watching him, this indicates that he will enter a state of severe and acute illness that reaches the point of Death, but God comforts him and heals him. The interpretation of dreams that the eagle carries him and flies with him. Whoever carries the eagle and flies with him has many interpretations that differ depending on the state of flight. He flies straight in the sky and enters the clouds. This dream is not a good sign as it may indicate death or calamities. As for the flight of an eagle, it is a natural flight, and under the clouds and close to the ground, this indicates travel to other lands. Interpretation of seeing an eagle for a married woman. A married woman who sees an eagle in a dream is a sign of kindness and optimism. And the eagle flying above the woman’s head indicates the love and attention that she receives from her husband. And who does she see in this dream? The eagle looked at her, and this indicates the security and protection she enjoys from her husband. Interpretation of the vision of an eagle for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who dreams of victory, this indicates her safety and the birth of a healthy child, and may indicate good luck. If you see an eagle in a dream, this means That the new baby will be a male. Interpretation of seeing an eagle for a single woman. Seeing an eagle in a dream is a sign of good luck and wealth enjoyed by an unmarried woman and may indicate travel and success in it. And who do you see in this dream? The eagle surrounds its nest and its children and it works to feed them, so this is a sign of Close marriage. Seeing an eagle in a dream is a sign of goodness and success in her life, and the wings of an eagle indicate abundance of money. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations about seeing an eagle in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with explanation as soon as possible.

title: What you do not know about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing coal in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing coal in a dream for senior scholars? When the dreamer sees burning coal in his dream, he immediately goes to reliable sources to find out what the symbol (coal in a dream) indicates, and since we are on an Egyptian site that is interested in interpreting all the symbols that appear to you in dreams, we decided to provide you with Let's show in detail what was said about this code through the following. Coal in a dream Ibn Shaheen explained that the interpretation of the dream of coal does not have a promising connotation, and he said that its most prominent connotations indicate that the devil will succeed in seducing the monarch and adorning forbidden ways for him, and thus he obtains suspicious livelihood. Actions, and these actions will be determined by the life of the seer. Perhaps he is one of the merchants who do not fear God for the quality of their goods and sell them to people at the highest prices, and who do not deserve all those prices they pay, and therefore this work will be theft of people's money. Because he will be one of the cheaters. If the dreamer is among those who work in the engineering and architecture professions, it is very likely that he is one of those who receive bribes to allow real estate owners to build wrong floors. The fields that God Almighty has forbidden completely and in detail, such as alcohol, drugs, and others. Ibn Sirin agreed with Ibn Shaheen on seeing coal in a dream and said that it represents money that God and His Messenger are not pleased with in this world and the hereafter. The first interpretation: He said that coal may mean that the dreamer will face a dangerous person, and by (dangerous) we mean here that he is very violent and his fate and position are great, and to protect the dreamer from harming any unjust person. Life, he must not be drawn to dealing with men deeply, or in the sense that he explained that he must set rules and limits for himself in his dealings with all people, and thus he will be safe from the harm of every unjust and harmful person. The second interpretation: The vision expresses the changes that will occur in the dreamer's dream and its content is that God may write him to work with the ruler or do a job that makes him close to him, because the dream contains some signs that symbolize a lot of money that the dreamer will get from the president or the sultan and the person in general does not get money except from three main players. Whether a job, inheritance, or financial assistance from family and friends. The third interpretation: Coal has many uses in life, and indeed the seer uses some necessary and useful tools at work to be at his best. In order to present the most important interpretations of the great scholars of coal, it is necessary to present what Al-Nabulsi mentioned, where he said: If the coal glows in the vision and the flame burns in it, this is a sign. From the injustice of the ruler or the president to the seer, he steals his money, especially his money. Coal has many sizes in wakefulness, and each size has its uses, and Al-Nabulsi explained that if the seer takes large pieces of coal to do something with it, he does not need that large size, but needs small pieces, this is a sign. That the important things in his life will stop for some time. His work or a project he wanted to open to enjoy its profits will stop, all of this will upset him and this will return to the viewer many positive feelings
